column5: I have posted it in the classifieds and will be putting it on some other sites as well but I'm not sure what other information I should be posting. If some of you guys that frequently sell stuff on line could take a quick look and give me some suggestions I'd really appreciate it.
Nice ride. 8.1 liter gas engine so miles per gallon or kms per liter is interesting to know IMHO.
Selling to buy a bigger one ?  How much bigger have you gott,n there Big Cliff ?

Nice ride. I have always wanted to get one but my wife has zero interest in the lifestyle. I rented one for a week once and headed to Myrtle Beach, she wanted to bail after the 1st night. Maybe I'll just buy yours and go solo. Why may I ask why you aren't going to use it any longer Cliff? If I was single I'd sell my house and hit the road for a few years. Canada spring to late Fall then point the thing until the compass say S and keep it there until I see Palm trees. AQctually I know a widower that does the exact same thing. People he knows will fly to where he is and join him for a few weeks. He has a little electric scooter in the back for shopping etc. perfect.
Selling it because I now want a bigger oneÂ ðŸ˜Š
No Terry,Â you canâ€™t put ice tires on and take it on Simcoe. Brian would love you if you did.
You do know, Terry fish,s the afternoon shift .
Those retired guys! Sleep until noon! You drive while he sleeps and when he wakes up he can fish!
Thank you, I appreciate the suggestion, I have added that info.
LOL, I have had some nice fishing trips with it already this summer, it's completely self sufficient, setup takes less than 3 minutes and you've got all the comforts of home.
